title: Can you solve the rogue AI riddle? - Dan Finkel

options.label: A
options.text: Lowering the water level as quickly as possible

options.label: B

options.label: D
options.text: Letting NIM make the first move

options.label: B

options.text: By lowering the water level by 4 stories on your first turn

options.label: D
options.text: By letting NIM make the first move

multiple-choice.question: What is the pattern of the "losing" levels in the lab?

options.label: D

title: Why don’t poisonous animals poison themselves? - Rebecca D. Tarvin

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: The toxic animals will eventually become extinct.

options.label: D
options.text: The predators or prey will eventually become extinct.

options.label: A
options.text: Their nomadic lifestyle and harsh landscape

options.label: B
options.text: Their written records and historical accounts

options.label: C
options.text: Their trade relationships with the Greeks

options.label: D
options.text: Their restricted indoor lives for women

multiple-choice.question: Recent archaeological discoveries have provided evidence of:

options.label: A
options.text: The existence of male-dominated Scythian society

options.label: B
options.text: The lack of female warriors in Scythian culture

options.label: C
options.text: The presence of female skeletons buried with weapons in Scythian kurgans

options.label: D
options.text: The absence of Amazon-like warrior women in ancient historical accounts

multiple-choice.question: The mythic realm of Amazon tales in ancient Greece may have been a way to:

options.label: A
options.text: Imagine women and men as unequal companions

options.label: B
options.text: Portray women as weak and timid

options.label: C
options.text: Glorify the conquests of male heroes

options.label: D
options.text: Imagine women and men as equal companions
